name: Organic Website
description: A clean and eco-friendly website promoting organic products, sustainable farming, and healthy living. It includes a product catalog, blogs, and educational content on organic practices, with a nature-inspired design that emphasizes trust and transparency.

name: Travel Website
description: An all-in-one travel platform with destination guides, booking tools, and user stories. It helps travelers plan trips with detailed itineraries, maps, and real-time travel info, wrapped in a sleek, mobile-friendly interface.

name: Restaurant Website
description: A stylish website for restaurants featuring online menus, reservations, and food ordering. It includes chef profiles, customer reviews, and event updates, designed to enhance the digital dining experience.

name: ShopEase
description: ShopEase is a modern and user-friendly e-commerce platform designed to provide a seamless online shopping experience. Users can browse a wide range of products, add items to their cart, and securely complete purchases. The website features user authentication, profile management, and an admin panel for managing products, orders, and users. Integrated with a robust backend, ShopEase ensures secure transactions, efficient order handling, and responsive design for both desktop and mobile users.

name: Foodie
description: Online food delivery website with menu, order section, and dashboard. Includes an Admin panel where Admin can add/modify food items and manage users. User-friendly design with secure authentication.
